ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and you do not worship what I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Nor do you worship who I worship,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: neither do you worship Him Whom I worship;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: nor do you worship what I worship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Nor do you worship Whom I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nor will you worship whom I worship."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nor do you serve Him Whom I serve:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and you are not serving what I serve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nor worship ye that which I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You do not worship what I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor are ye the worshippers of that which I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: nor do you worship what I worship;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nor will you worship that which I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: nor do you worship what I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Nor do you worship what I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [109:3] and you do not worship, at present, what I worship, and that is God, exalted be He, alone,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nor worship ye that which I worship) that which I will worship in the future.
